data.name: Pinball FX2 - Star Wars™ Pinball: Star Wars Rebels™
data.detailed_description:
Journey to a galaxy far, far away to team up with the Ghost's crew, Hera, Kanan, Ezra, Zeb, Sabine and Chopper, as they join forces to take on the evil Empire in this table based on the Star Wars Rebels™ TV show!

Table features:
- A fully animated Ghost starship and TIE fighter models
- A flaming engine thruster spindisk
- Awesome mini playfield dedicated to Chopper
- Unique Force™-operated ball locker mechanism
- Ezra Bridger, Kanan Jarrus, Chopper, The Inquisitor and a stormtrooper appear as fully animated 3D characters
- Seven exciting main modes inspired by the show plus three different multiball modes
data.about_the_game:
Journey to a galaxy far, far away to team up with the Ghost's crew, Hera, Kanan, Ezra, Zeb, Sabine and Chopper, as they join forces to take on the evil Empire in this table based on the Star Wars Rebels™ TV show!

Table features:
- A fully animated Ghost starship and TIE fighter models
- A flaming engine thruster spindisk
- Awesome mini playfield dedicated to Chopper
- Unique Force™-operated ball locker mechanism
- Ezra Bridger, Kanan Jarrus, Chopper, The Inquisitor and a stormtrooper appear as fully animated 3D characters
- Seven exciting main modes inspired by the show plus three different multiball modes
data.short_description: Join the cunning Rebel crew of the Ghost starship as they embark on their journey to become heroes with the power to ignite a rebellion. These few alone are brave enough to defy the evil Empire on this unique pinball table based on  Star Wars Rebels™!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor:Single Core CPU @ 1.6GHz
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 6600 / Radeon 9800
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:2500 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8
  • Processor:Dual Core CPU @ 2.00GHz
  • Memory:1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics:GeForce 8800 / Radeon HD 3850
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:3500 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible sound card
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
